description: This form allows you to create a new weekly menu that can be assigned to the current week. Enter the menu title (required), a brief description (optional), and, if necessary, select dietary restrictions. Once the menu is created, you can start planning and managing the weekly meal plan.
noWeeklyMenu: You have not created any weekly menus yet

validation.titleRequired: Title is required and must be unique
validation.titleLength: Title must be between 3 and 70 characters
validation.descriptionLength: Description must be less than 200 characters
